text: Ba durusti, dar ofarinisi osmonho ʙinoʙar ʙalandi va vase'ijas va zamin ʙinoʙar kuhu pasti va darjohojas va dar pai jakdigar omadani saʙu ruz va dar kistihoe, ki dar darjo meravand va saʙaʙi naf'i mardumand va dar ʙorone, ki Alloh az osmon furu mefiristad, to zamini murdaro ʙa on zinda sozad va cunʙandagonro dar on parokanda kunad va dar gardonidani ʙodho va aʙrhoi romsuda, ki mijoni zaminu osmonand, dar hamai inho ʙaroi xiradmandone, ki darmejoʙand, nisonahost! Va ʙa in dalelho mefahmand, ki ʙa cuz Alloh hec kas sazovori iʙodat nest
